text: Spanair Flight 5022 was a passenger flight from Barcelona, Spain to Gran Canaria via Madrid. On 20 August 2008 the McDonnell Douglas MD-82 operating this route crashed after take-off from runway 36L at Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas Airport. All 6 crew members and 148 of 166 passengers aboard were killed. The cause of the crash was pilot error due to failure to configure the flaps and slats properly for take-off. ==Victims== Nationality Passengers Crew Total 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 2 0 2 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 2 0 2 1 0 1 5 0 5 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 148 6 154 1 0 1 1 0 1 1 0 1 2 0 2 Total 166 6 172 Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in the 2000s Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Europe Category:2000s in Spain Category:2008 in Europe
title: Spanair Flight 5022
